metadata.title: CVE-2024-41016 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ocfs2: strict bound check before memcmp in ocfs2_xattr_find_entry()xattr in ocfs2 maybe 'non-indexed', which saved with additional spacerequested.  It's better to check if the memory is out of bound beforememcmp, although this possibility mainly comes from crafted poisonousimages.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
